caption.p: Effect of different concentrations of lavender essential oil (LO) added to Qodume Shirazi seed mucilage (QSSM)‐based edible coating on color changes of ostrich meat during 9 days of storage at 4°C (1: control; 2: QSSM + 0% LO; 3: QSSM+%0.5 LO; 4: QSSM+ %1 LO; 5: QSSM+%1.5 LO; and 6: QSSM+%2 LO)
